What day?

What time do you want your table?
OK. And for how many people?

Good evening. How may I help you?

[RESTAURANT NAME]. How can I help you?

OK, how can I help you?
We’re actually closed tonight for a private party. Sorry about that

We aren’t taking bookings for [DAY], it’s first come first served
If you get here by [TIME] you should get a table

For which day?
May I know the evening?
Certainly, when?
When would you like to have dinner?
Of course, what evening will you be joining us?
OK. When are you coming?
For which day? I’ll be with you in a minute.

So what day do you need a table?
Okay, when would you like your reservation?
Ok, when should I get one for you?
When would you like to book one?
When shall you arrive?
ok, when do you want the reservation?

What time would you like the reservation for?
Of course, just tell me what time you’d like the reservation for?
What time would like to have dinner?
OK. What time will you be dining with us?
Can you tell me what time would you like the reservation for?

At what time?
What time will you be arriving?
Certainly, what time?
What time?
What time do you want to book for?
Sorry, we’re having some problems with the booking system, can you hold for a minute please?
OK, we’re back up and running. What time did you say you wanted the table for?
Oh, it looks like we’re having a problem with our booking system. Can you wait for just one minute?
Hello. I’m really sorry about this but I can’t access the bookings right now. Can you call back in [NUMBER] minutes?
For how many people?
A table for how many guests?
How many people will you need the reservation for?
How many guests will be in your party?
How many diners will be in your group?
How many will be in the party?

And how many people?
Okay. Perfect. How many people?
How many are coming?
How many people are in your party?
How many people will you need the reservation for?
How many people will be in your group?
So how many people is it for?
Oh OK, I’ll need to check that with the manager. Can I put you on hold for a sec?
Hi again. Yes, we can do that
So how many people are coming?
Right, I’m going to have to check that with the manager. I’ll be back in a sec.
Hi there. I’m sorry but we can’t take groups larger than [NUMBER].
Okay. Perfect. How many people? Oh, sorry, can you hold a sec please?
Hello, sorry we’ve got a full house tonight. OK, so that’s for how many people?
Any special requests?
Any thing in particular?
Any special mentions?
Can i do anything else for you?
Anything specific you want ?
OK. I’ll notify our chef, and make a note of it beside your booking.
OK. Let me just check with our chef if we can accommodate that
Hello, OK, so that’s no problem
OK. Let me just check with our chef
Hello, actually we can’t guarantee there won’t be traces of [ALLERGEN] in the food, we use it for other recipes
Oh, I’ll need to check that with another member of staff. Sorry, I’m new here. I’ll be back in a minute.
Hi there, yeah, that’s no problem, we can accommodate that
That’s no problem, I’ll seat you at a suitable table
I’ll make a note of it . Do you have any other requests?
Uh, could you please note we will be celebrating a [OCCASION]?
Is it a special occasion?
Is it for a special event
Would you like a window seat?
Would you like a corner table or the middle?
We can’t guarantee a window table, but I’ll note your preference.
Do you want to be seated indoors or in our garden area?
Would you like a seat indoors?
Would you like a table in our upstairs dining room or downstairs?
Would you like a garden seat?

Of course

We can only seat you in the garden

And a phone number please?

Is there a phone number we can get you on?
May I have your number, please?
I repeat [NUMBER], is that right?
I repeat [NUMBER], is that right?

Sorry about that. OK, so your number is [NUMBER]?

That’s one digit too short

So that’s a table for [PARTY NUMBER], for next [DAY] at [TIME]?
Okay. Let me repeat it back to you. This is a reservation for [DAY] for [PARTY NUMBER] at [TIME]. Is that correct?
OK, I will repeat all the information you gave me. [DAY] at [TIME], table for [PARTY NUMBER].
OK, let me just double-check your details. Oh, sorry, can you excuse me for a moment?
Sorry about that. Where were we, yeah, it’s a table for [NUMBER], on [DAY], at {TIME}
Please excuse me, while I check the reservations. I’ll be right back.
I’m going to put your call on hold, while I check availability.
Just one moment please, while I see what we have available.
Thank you, just give me a minute and let me check
I’m just going to put you on hold for a few secs
Hold on one moment please, while I check what’s available
Please excuse me for a moment. I will check if there is still a table available
I’ll take a look and be back in a second.
Thank you for waiting. Yes, we have a spot free
I’m sorry to keep you waiting. I can seat you at [TIME] on [DAY]
Sorry to keep you on hold. We do have a table available at that time
I can confirm your reservation for a table for [PARTY NUMBER], [DAY] night at [TIME]
Yes, that’s fine. See you at [TIME] this [DAY]
Thank you, see you this [DAY] at [TIME]
OK. We will see you this [DAY] at [TIME]
All booked
That’s four people booked for [TIME] tomorrow
OK, we'll see you next week
OK. Your reservation is booked. Is there anything else I can do for you?
We’ll see you tomorrow evening at [TIME] then
able for [PARTY NUMBER] at [TIME] this [DAY]

Okay, done. We reserved your table for [PARTY NUMBER], for tomorrow evening
We’re very busy on [DAY]. But I can fit you in at [TIME]. The table is only free for 90 minutes. Is that OK
I’ll need credit card details, we have a cancellation fee if you don’t show up
We can fit you, but you might have to wait
We can fit you, but there might be a short wait
We have a bar area you can stay until your table is ready
We do have a table but you might have to wait a bit
I’m afraid we don’t have a table at that time. Would [TIME] be OK?
I’m afraid we don’t have a table available at that time. But there is a table free at [TIME]
I’m sorry to say that we don’t have a table available at that time. Would later suit? Say [TIME]?
I’m sorry to say that we don’t have a table available at that time. Would later suit? Say [TIME]?
Do you want me to hold the table while you check?
I’m very sorry but we don’t have any tables left for that time, would [TIME] suit?
Sorry. The reservations for today are full. You can reserve for [DAY}
Oh, I’m sorry. We’re booked solid tonight
We don’t have any tables free tonight. I’m very sorry about that
May I help you to reserve a table at another one of our restaurants instead?
Perhaps you’d like to eat in our other restaurant, (RESTAURANT NAME)?
I’m sorry, we can only fit [NUMBER] people [DAY]
We’ve only got a table free for [NUMBER] people
We’ll let you know if there’s a cancellation
Do you want us to give you a call if there’s a cancellation
We can give you a call if anyone cancels
Can you call back later? I’m waiting to see if a group needs one or two tables
Can you call back in [NUMBER] hours? We have a preliminary booking that might cancel
We’ve moved address to [ADDRESS]
We’ve actually moved address this week
It’s [ADDRESS]
Our main entrance is on [STREET NAME]
There is a band coming on at [TIME]
Thank you very much for calling, [NAME]. We look forward to seeing you then. Have a great day.
Thank you very much for booking with us, and we look forward to being of service to you this evening
Thank you [NAME], we look forward to seeing you later
Have a pleasant day
Thank you for calling
Look forward to seeing you, [NAME]
No problem, what name is it booked under?
Sure, what’s the name
I’ll check now. Can you tell me your name?
Give me a moment please
Sorry about that, we’re very busy tonight. How can I help you?
Let me check our system, one second
I need your name please
No problem, what’s the name?
Can you hold on a second
Sorry about that, how can I help you?
OK, is it for today?
OK. What day is it booked for?
OK. What what day is the table booked for?
Sorry about the noise, we’re very busy tonight

This line is bad, can you call back?
And how are you today?
[SAYS A LOT OF MENU INFORMATION]
We have no child policy after [TIME]
It’s a no child policy restaurant
Tonight is our special menu, it’s [FOOD TYPE]
Our [FOOD TYPE] delivery couldn’t make it today, so it won’t be on the menu
We serve a buffet on [DAY], is that OK?
We have a buffet on [DAY], but we also have our normal menu
Will you be having the buffet or our special menu?

Yes, that’s no problem
Are you having the regular menu or the buffet?
We need to know in advance

No, our license doesn’t permit it
It’s a BYOB restaurant, there’s no corkage fee

[DOESN’T COME BACK TO THE PHONE AFTER CHECKING SOMETHING]
OK, what was the name?
Oh, OK, can you tell me what day again you want a table?
[DOESN’T COME BACK TO THE PHONE AFTER CHECKING SOMETHING]
Oh, I’m sorry, I don’t know what happened
Right, so it was for [NAME], wasn’t it?
What day is your reservation for?
Got it. All confirmed, see you [day]
What day is it for?
Right, let me check. Can you hold a sec please?
Hi, I’m so sorry about this but my colleague has booked the table for someone else, while we were waiting for you to call back
I’m very sorry for the mix-up, my colleague is new and isn’t familiar with our system
OK. What day are you coming?
I’ll just take a look. One minute
I’m sorry but we don’t have a record of your booking
Yes we can, we still have a table free. I’ll just need to take some details
OK. What day?
Let me look for it, one second
I can’t find your booking here, are you sure it’s for [DAY]
I’ve looked again and there isn’t a record of it, I’m sorry about this
We’re fully booked on [DAY], sorry
Sorry, you must have dialed the wrong number
This isn’t a restaurant
Wrong number
